RoomComponent.m_description: The landscape slopes slowly upwards here. The hillside is broken by small sloughs and cliffs, and passage is treacherous. A few scattered stones lead to an overgrown path, and soon a ruin is before you.  The remnants of a castle crumble into the dust. Fallen battlements and faded banners call back memories of a grander time.A faint blue light emmanates from a nearby cavern.
